skillTree.localised_description: Black Grail Knight Barded Mare

attributes.bullet_text: This unit is Undead (does not rout, immune to terror, becomes unstable when Leadership is low).
This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.
Even when performing the most fatiguing actions, this unit never loses vigour.
Entities with this attribute double their charge bonus when attacking the rear or flank of an entity.

skillTree.localised_description: Wreathed in twisted in shadow and cold unattural steel, these horrific imitations are even fiercer than their living brethen

attributes.bullet_text: This unit is Undead (does not rout, immune to terror, becomes unstable when Leadership is low).
This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
Even when performing the most fatiguing actions, this unit never loses vigour.
This unit can fly.
Entities with this attribute double their charge bonus when attacking the rear or flank of an entity.

skillTree.localised_description: The Black Squires care not for the honor of the living.

effects.description:
Unit Ability: "Pike Formation" 
	(all units in army)

attributes.bullet_text: When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any attacker.
This unit cannot run and will only move at walking pace.
When bracing, this unit causes additional damage when attacking charging enemies.
The unit will try to stay in formation when in melee. Melee defence will be slightly increased.

skillTree.localised_description: From the verdant depths, the Lady rises to protect the faithful.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: It's An Endless Abyss
The Grail has bestowed the blackest of curses, with the sweetest of blessings
Unquenching hunger.
The mere rumour of their presence has caused even battle hardened veterans to become strangled by terror
Where there should be a  un-ending sorrow there is only the void

effects.description: Enables "Dazed" contact effect (reduced Speed and Melee Defence)

skillTree.localised_description: Sanguine terror

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: Wrath and ruin called down upon the the unfaithful! Our Black Crusade shall not be halted!
They only thing left in their wake is death and decay
Even the bravest become gripped gripped in terror when in their presence
Once their was warm and vibrant life, there is only cold and unfeeling death
Soldiers in doubt to flee or attack when they see them
The dead gets stronger where the living flees
Eldritch strength bestowed by unnatural means
The need for fresh red meat is not driven by hunger for sustenance, but the unholy exhilaration of consuming an enemy’s flesh.
There is nothing but utter belief. There is no reasoning with this one.
"Don't look into their eyes, there is only death there!"
Such is this one's conviction that others have no choice but to believe.
Speaking words of power or faith can alter perceptions on the battlefield.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
This one will not go down easily – it will be necessary to break both the will and the body first.
An omen, a sign - this being knows things and any who follow will share their glory.
Never to be broken or dishonoured – never to succumb to the foe.
This one fights with a fervour to be both admired and despised.
Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 6%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 9%

skillTree.localised_description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Spread Corruption action: Vampiric corruption is increased by an additional 1
Spread Corruption action: Vampiric corruption is increased by an additional 2
Spread Corruption action: Vampiric corruption is increased by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Raised from that which was previously thought impossible, these legendary warriors stand amongst the most powerful of all undead.

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

backgroundSkills.localised_description: You'd think there wasn't much further to fall, but you'd be wrong - it's a long, long way down to Stromfels' Chest, after all…
